column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Super delicious deep dish that is more cheesy and satisfying than the ones we have back in SF.  The tomato sauce is tangy and sweet
column2: and the cheese just oozes into your plate.  We got a small and a bruschetta (highly recommended) for the two of us
column3: and ended up with about 1/4 as leftovers. Root beer was a great accompaniment.  Our server was friendly and fast.  We really enjoyed the meal.
